name: WhatsApp Business
description: Integrate with WhatsApp Business to send, send, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Send Message
tools.description: Send a text message via WhatsApp Business API. Requires the recipient phone number in international format and the message text.

tools.name: Send Template
tools.description: Send a pre-approved message template via WhatsApp Business API. Templates are required for initiating conversations.

tools.name: Get Media
tools.description: Retrieve media metadata (URL, MIME type, size) for a WhatsApp media ID. The URL can then be used to download the media.

tools.name: List Templates
tools.description: List approved message templates for the WhatsApp Business account. Templates are required for initiating conversations with users.

phoneNumberId.label: Phone Number ID
phoneNumberId.description: Your WhatsApp Business Phone Number ID from the Meta Developer Dashboard
